content:
When I merged my pull request (763), I got a success notification, the merge worked, but when I looked at the log at

https://dev.azure.com/fhir-build/build.fhir.org/_build/results?buildId=2707&_a=summary&view=logs&j=fd490c07-0b22-5182-fac9-6d67fe1e939b&t=59d5b2ff-d842-581a-8fe3-fd774adf34a7

I saw the following:
https://dev.azure.com/fhir-build/build.fhir.org/_build/results?buildId=2707&view=logs&j=fd490c07-0b22-5182-fac9-6d67fe1e939b&t=59d5b2ff-d842-581a-8fe3-fd774adf34a7&l=22

Does the key need to be updated?
@Josh Mandel I don't know why the key would have changed

The host keys for the server chat accepts publish data change anytime a new container is started up; so this is a non-issue. I'll update the CI build process so it doesn't complain -- thanks for the report!
